name: bibliographic-resource
title: Bibliographic Resource
description: A book, article, or other documentary resource.
rdfs:comment: A book, article, or other documentary resource.

fields.name: referenceID
fields.title: Reference ID
fields.description: An identifier for a dcterms:BibliographicResource.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: parentReferenceID
fields.title: Parent Reference ID
fields.description: An identifier for a dcterms:BibliographicResource that this dcterms:BibliographicResource is a part of.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: referenceType
fields.title: Reference Type
fields.description: A category that best matches the nature of a dcterms:BibliographicResource.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.

fields.name: bibliographicCitation
fields.title: Bibliographic Citation
fields.description: A bibliographic reference for a dcterms:BibliographicResource.
fields.comments: Recommended practice is to include sufficient bibliographic detail to identify the resource as unambiguously as possible. The intended usage of this term in Darwin Core is to provide the preferred way to cite the resource itself. Note that the intended usage of dcterms:references in Darwin Core, by contrast, is to point to the definitive source representation of the resource, if one is available.
fields.rdfs:comment: A bibliographic reference for the resource.

fields.name: title
fields.title: Title
fields.description: A name given to a resource.
fields.comments: Typically, a dc:title will be a name by which the resource is formally known.
fields.rdfs:comment: A name given to the resource.

fields.name: author
fields.title: Author
fields.description: A name of a dcterms:Agent primarily responsible for creating a dcterms:BibliographicResource.
fields.comments: Examples of a dcterms:creator include a person, an organization, or a service.
fields.rdfs:comment: An entity primarily responsible for making the resource.

fields.name: authorID
fields.title: Author ID
fields.description: An identifier for a dcterms:Agent primarily responsible for making a dcterms:BibliographicResource.
fields.comments: Examples of a dcterms:creator include a person, an organization, or a service.
fields.rdfs:comment: An entity primarily responsible for making the resource.

fields.name: editor
fields.title: Editor
fields.description: A name of a dcterms:Agent having managerial and sometimes policy-making responsibility for the editorial part of a publishing firm or of a newspaper, magazine, or other publication.
fields.rdfs:comment: A person having managerial and sometimes policy-making responsibility for the editorial part of a publishing firm or of a newspaper, magazine, or other publication.

fields.name: editorID
fields.title: Editor ID
fields.description: An identifier for a dcterms:Agent having managerial and sometimes policy-making responsibility for the editorial part of a publishing firm or of a newspaper, magazine, or other publication.

fields.name: publisher
fields.title: Publisher
fields.description: A name of a dcterms:Agent responsible for making a dcterms:BibliographicResource available.
fields.comments: Examples of a dcterms:publisher include a person, an organization, or a service. Typically, the name of a dcterms:publisher should be used to indicate the entity.
fields.rdfs:comment: An entity responsible for making the resource available.

fields.name: publisherID
fields.title: Publisher ID
fields.description: An identifier for a dcterms:Agent responsible for making a Reference available.
fields.comments: Examples of a dcterms:publisher include a person, an organization, or a service.
fields.rdfs:comment: An entity responsible for making the resource available.

fields.name: volume
fields.title: Volume
fields.description: A volume number of a dcterms:BibliographicResource.

fields.name: issue
fields.title: Issue
fields.description: An issue number of a dcterms:BibliographicResource.

fields.name: edition
fields.title: Edition
fields.description: An edition of a dcterms:BibliographicResource.
fields.rdfs:comment: The name defining a special edition of a document.

fields.name: pages
fields.title: Pages
fields.description: A range of pages within a dcterms:BibliographicResource.
fields.rdfs:comment: A string of non-contiguous page spans that locate a Document within a Collection. Example: 23-25, 34, 54-56. For continuous page ranges, use the pageStart and pageEnd properties.

fields.name: version
fields.title: Version
fields.description: A version number of a dcterms:BibliographicResource.
fields.rdfs:comment: The version number of a resource. This is a freetext string, typical values are "1.5" or "21". The URI identifying the previous version can be provided using prov:previousVersion.

fields.name: issued
fields.title: Issued
fields.description: Date of formal issuance of a dcterms:BibliographicResource.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a date that conforms to ISO 8601-1:2019.

fields.name: accessed
fields.title: Accessed
fields.description: The resource is related to a source which was originally accessed or consulted on the given date as part of creating or authoring the resource. The source(s) should be specified using pav:sourceAccessedAt.
fields.rdfs:comment: The resource is related to a source which was originally accessed or consulted on the given date as part of creating or authoring the resource. The source(s) should be specified using pav:sourceAccessedAt.

fields.name: peerReviewStatus
fields.title: Peer Review Status
fields.description: An indication of whether a dcterms:BibliographicResource was peer reviewed.

fields.name: referenceRemarks
fields.title: Reference Remarks
fields.description: Comments or notes about a dcterms:BibliographicResource.
